Detailed Description

Provides an interface to an input buffer optimised for FusionEngine.

FusionEngine contains only gameplay functions, so all input is either contol input for ships, or global input - such as opening the console / menu (which have their own input handlers) or quitting the game.

Member Function Documentation

bool FusionInput::Test (   ) 
 

Finds required devices.

This checks all input maps currently bound (by FusionInput::SetInputMaps()) to see if the device they are set to is present. If it isn't the test fails.

Returns:
True if all devices are found.
See also:
PlayerInputMap | GlobalInputMap
